title: WTB: Low grade 1895 Mayo Louisville Player or Hamilton
author: TT40391

posts.post_title: WTB: Low grade 1895 Mayo Louisville Player or Hamilton
posts.post_content:
Hello, I have come to realize that the old judge louisville players are out of my price range but a low grade N300 mayo louisville player is possible.  If anyone has one avaliable please let me know.  Also if anyone happens to have a low grade Billy Hamilton from the set please let me know also.  You can message me throught the board or at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  I can pay by paypal or money order.  I am seeking a louisville player from the mayo set because I focus on kentucky related cards, and Hamilton is a player I really respect from that era after doing research on him.  So if anyone has a glasscock or pheifer(did I spell that right?) from louisville or a hamilton please let me know.  Thanks for all the help as always 

William

William,
I sent a reply through your e-mail.  I am just messaging to make sure you got it.
Jim

I have a N300 Hamilton I am selling on my for sale page.  Here is the link:

[url]http://imageevent.com/brailey/cardsforsale[/url]

Best regards,
Mike Brailey
E-mail:  [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url]

posts.post_title: Hello Jim I got your message
posts.post_content:
Hello Jim thank you for sending an email.  I got it and I just sent you a reply. Thanks also for the tip on the Hamilton Mike, it is still a little out of my price range right now but later this fall if you still have it I may be in touch with you about it when I have a little more money free.  Thanks

William
